metadata.description: David, Carrie, and Dean find themselves in a game for their lives and with every deathmatch against the vicious Sportsmen getting deadlier, everyone getting out of this Olympic Games from hell alive is getting more and more unlikely. The reimagining of the Roger Corman cult classic continues!
metadata.name: Roger Corman Presents: Deathsport Games (Bluewater), Vol. 1
